name: SPAT
description: Plugin that reads PTLM data from a configuration file, receives live data from the signal controller, and publishes a J2735 SPAT message.

messageTypes.description: Signal Phase and Timing (SPAT) status for the signalized intersection.

configuration.description: The intersection id for SPAT generated by this plugin.
The intersection name for SPAT generated by this plugin.
JSON data defining a list of SignalGroups and phases.
The IPv4 address of the local computer for receiving Traffic Signal Controller Broadcast Messages.
The local UDP port for reception of Traffic Signal Controller Broadcast Messages from the TSC.
The IPv4 address of the destination Traffic Signal Controller (TSC).
The destination port on the Traffic Signal Controller (TSC) for SNMP NTCIP communication.
